title: Thunderbird android app delayed response moving to each mail  account
creator: pasteve99
content:
Using Samsung Fold 6 and latest version of Thunderbird. Four email a counts set up. When I press the icon to change to another account either the app does not move to the other account or will respond a minute or so later. Most times it just does not respond 

An you assist?

Steven
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
